name: Iris Gal Maker
tagline: Cross-platform AVG game maker based on SFML.
body:
### Breif Description
This game maker is designed to be an easy-to-use japanese style adventurous game maker. AVG game designers can use this maker by writing their own text files or implementing the GUI to develop their own AVG games even without any knowledge about programming. It is written in C++ based on a powerful 2D cross-platform open-source graphics library SFML.

### Project Details
* Language: C++
* Tools: [SFML](https://github.com/LaurentGomila/SFML)
* Platforms: Windows, MacOS X, Linux 
* Proceedings: Maker's GUI front

### Sample Game Images
* Main Menu:
![Main Menu](http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8415/8709610662_18e70fc240_z.jpg)
* Game:
![Game](http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8397/8709610944_f7714dc1b7_z.jpg)
* Script:
![Script](http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8264/8708487583_2ea30b4fec_z.jpg)
* Find more in the gallery.

### Contact Information
* Author: nashdal13
* Email: nash13dal@hotmail.com
* Twitter: [@nashdal13](https://twitter.com/nashdal13)
